About PaperGen

PaperGen is a cutting-edge software solution designed to assist students in writing high-quality papers. Our platform simplifies the research and writing process, providing comprehensive tools and resources to help students produce well-crafted, thoroughly researched papers with ease. At PaperGen, we leverage advanced AI and data analytics to deliver personalized writing assistance, making success more accessible for students worldwide. Our team comprises experts from leading tech companies like Google, Microsoft, and Amazon, bringing together a wealth of knowledge in data science, AI, and education technology. We are dedicated to revolutionizing the writing process, making it more efficient, effective, and enjoyable for students.

For more about us, visit www.papergen.ai.

About The Role

As a Project Manager Intern at PaperGen, you will play a crucial role in coordinating and executing key projects that align with our strategic objectives. This internship provides an excellent opportunity to develop your project management skills by working closely with cross-functional teams, including marketing, engineering, and product development. You will be involved in planning, executing, and closing projects, ensuring they are completed on time, within scope, and within budget.

This is a full-time position for a 3-month summer internship (Sep-Dec), on a remote basis.

What You'll Do
  • Assist in Project Planning: Collaborate with team leads to define project scope, objectives, and deliverables.
  • Coordinate Team Efforts: Facilitate communication and coordination among different teams to ensure smooth project execution.
  • Track Progress: Monitor project timelines, milestones, and deliverables, ensuring projects stay on track.
  • Conduct Risk Analysis: Identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies to ensure successful project outcomes.
  • Documentation: Maintain comprehensive project documentation and update project management tools regularly.
  • Support Decision-Making: Provide data and insights to assist senior management in decision-making.
  • Communicate with Stakeholders: Ensure all stakeholders are informed of project status, changes, and any critical issues.
What You'll Need
  • Organizational Skills: Strong ability to manage multiple tasks, set priorities, and meet deadlines.
  • Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with native-level fluency in English.
  • Attention to Detail: High level of accuracy in tracking project details and maintaining documentation.
  • Team Collaboration: Ability to work effectively in a team environment and coordinate efforts across various departments.
  • Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to anticipate issues and propose solutions.
  • Interest in Project Management: A genuine interest in developing project management skills and knowledge.
  • Tech-Savvy: Comfortable using project management tools and software.
Why Join Us
  • Top-notch Team: Work with experienced professionals from Google, Microsoft, and Amazon.
  • Unlimited Vacation Policy: Enjoy a flexible vacation policy to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
  • Competitive Compensation: Receive an industry-leading salary, stock options, and benefits.
  • Continuous Learning: Benefit from fully sponsored conferences and training programs to support your professional growth.
Who You Are
  • Organized: Highly organized and capable of managing multiple priorities.
  • Proactive: A self-starter who can anticipate challenges and act to prevent them.
  • Detail-Oriented: Meticulous in managing project details and documentation.
  • Collaborative: A team player who values diverse perspectives and works well with others.
  • Eager to Learn: Enthusiastic about gaining experience in project management and growing your skill set.
